claim: There are 12 distinct card types featuring illustrations by Aaron Boyd.
reasoning: The database shows Aaron Boyd illustrated cards with only 2 distinct card types (Creature, Instant) in the 'types' column, or 4 distinct full type lines in the 'type' column. Neither matches the claimed 12 distinct card types.

content.text: I'll verify this claim by exploring the database schema and then querying for the distinct card types illustrated by Aaron Boyd.

input.description: List all tables in the database

content.content:
cards             legalities        set_translations
foreign_data      rulings           sets

cards             legalities        set_translations

content.content:
CREATE TABLE sqlite_sequence(name,seq);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "cards"
(
    id                      INTEGER           not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    artist                  TEXT,
    asciiName               TEXT,
    availability            TEXT,
    borderColor             TEXT,
    cardKingdomFoilId       TEXT,
    cardKingdomId           TEXT,
    colorIdentity           TEXT,
    colorIndicator          TEXT,
    colors                  TEXT,
    convertedManaCost       REAL,
    duelDeck                TEXT,
    edhrecRank              INTEGER,
    faceConvertedManaCost   REAL,
    faceName                TEXT,
    flavorName              TEXT,
    flavorText              TEXT,
    frameEffects            TEXT,
    frameVersion            TEXT,
    hand                    TEXT,
    hasAlternativeDeckLimit INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasContentWarning       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasFoil                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasNonFoil              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isAlternative           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isFullArt               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly            INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOversized             INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPromo                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReprint               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReserved              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStarter               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStorySpotlight        INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTextless              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTimeshifted           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    keywords                TEXT,
    layout                  TEXT,
    leadershipSkills        TEXT,
    life                    TEXT,
    loyalty                 TEXT,
    manaCost                TEXT,
    mcmId                   TEXT,
    mcmMetaId               TEXT,
    mtgArenaId              TEXT,
    mtgjsonV4Id             TEXT,
    mtgoFoilId              TEXT,
    mtgoId                  TEXT,
    multiverseId            TEXT,
    name                    TEXT,
    number                  TEXT,
    originalReleaseDate     TEXT,
    originalText            TEXT,
    originalType            TEXT,
    otherFaceIds            TEXT,
    power                   TEXT,
    printings               TEXT,
    promoTypes              TEXT,
    purchaseUrls            TEXT,
    rarity                  TEXT,
    scryfallId              TEXT,
    scryfallIllustrationId  TEXT,
    scryfallOracleId        TEXT,
    setCode                 TEXT,
    side                    TEXT,
    subtypes                TEXT,
    supertypes              TEXT,
    tcgplayerProductId      TEXT,
    text                    TEXT,
    toughness               TEXT,
    type                    TEXT,
    types                   TEXT,
    uuid                    TEXT              not null
        unique,
    variations              TEXT,
    watermark               TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "foreign_data"
(
    id           INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    flavorText   TEXT,
    language     TEXT,
    multiverseid INTEGER,
    name         TEXT,
    text         TEXT,
    type         TEXT,
    uuid         TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "legalities"
(
    id     INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    format TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    uuid   TEXT

content.text: I can see there's a `cards` table with `artist` and `types` columns. Let me query for distinct card types by Aaron Boyd.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT types) FROM cards WHERE artist = 'Aaron Boyd';"
input.description: Count distinct card types for Aaron Boyd

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT DISTINCT types FROM cards WHERE artist = 'Aaron Boyd';"
input.description: List distinct card types for Aaron Boyd

content.text: The query shows only 2 distinct card types for Aaron Boyd (Creature and Instant), not 12. Let me also check if maybe they meant the `type` column (full type line) instead of `types`:

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT type) FROM cards WHERE artist = 'Aaron Boyd';"
input.description: Count distinct type values for Aaron Boyd

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT DISTINCT type FROM cards WHERE artist = 'Aaron Boyd';"
input.description: List distinct type values for Aaron Boyd

content.content:
Creature — Bird
Instant
Creature — Cat
Creature — Kavu

tool_use_result.stdout:
Creature — Bird
Instant
Creature — Cat
Creature — Kavu

content.text:
Using the `type` column (full type line) gives 4 distinct values, still not 12. The claim states 12 distinct card types, but the data shows only 2 distinct `types` values (Creature, Instant) or 4 distinct `type` values. Either way, 12 is incorrect.

```json
{"label": "CONTRADICTED", "reasoning": "The database shows Aaron Boyd illustrated cards with only 2 distinct card types (Creature, Instant) in the 'types' column, or 4 distinct full type lines in the 'type' column. Neither matches the claimed 12 distinct card types."}
```
